resources.string: RBook is a road book reader/generator.\n It is aimed to share your trips with friends and enjoy riding throughout the world.\n If you like it, please share it!

Main page proposes you to select the roadbook you want to read.
 By selecting one, you will first see the overall road book description. Then press "go" button at the bottom to start your trip and see it point after point.
 You can navigate trough the road point with the right and left arrows.
 Top text in the point view is the direction you need to follow after the point is passed, followed by the distance to next point.
 Below, the current point image with the immediate instructions you need to follow on that point (Yellow Arrow). Below again, a small description of the current point with some observations, the kilometer (Distance from the start of the trip) and the partial kilometer (Ditance from last point).
The top bar (Action bar) provides you the possibility to Add, Edit or delete a road book.\n Feel free to create your own road books!
